sqlMap.insert: CONSTITUENT_ID, CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT(AMOUNT), SUM(AMOUNT), from GIFT where DONATION_DATE >= #startDate# and DONATION_DATE <= #endDate# group by CONSTITUENT_ID, CURRENCY_CODE

g.CONSTITUENT_ID, g.CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT(ag.ADJUSTED_AMOUNT), SUM(ag.ADJUSTED_AMOUNT) from ADJUSTED_GIFT ag, GIFT g where g.DONATION_DATE >= #startDate# and g.DONATION_DATE <= #endDate# and g.GIFT_ID = ag.GIFT_ID group by g.CONSTITUENT_ID, g.CURRENCY_CODE

cf.FIELD_VALUE as CONSTITUENT_ID, g.CURRENCY_CODE, COUNT(dl.AMOUNT), SUM(dl.AMOUNT), from GIFT g, DISTRO_LINE dl, CUSTOM_FIELD cf where DONATION_DATE >= #startDate# and DONATION_DATE <= #endDate# and g.GIFT_ID = dl.GIFT_ID and cf.ENTITY_ID = dl.DISTRO_LINE_ID and cf.FIELD_NAME='onBehalfOf' and cf.entityType='distributionline' group by cf.FIELD_VALUE, g.CURRENCY_CODE
